Simple To-Do App in Laravel ✅

Created a simple to-do app in Laravel 5.3 using Homestead.

Friday - January 13, 2017

1 minute read ∙ 54 words

0 Comments

Created a simple to-do app in Laravel 5.3 using Homestead.

This app was done for an engineering internship screening for DoSomething.org.

The source code can be found at https://github.com/fvcproductions/ds-todos.

The full process for setting up Laravel 5.3 is pretty tedious so I created my own tutorial as well!
